topic.title: Symbols Used in the Schema Diagram

body.p: The Full Model View renders all the Relax NG Schema patterns with intuitive symbols:

ul.li: - define pattern with the combine attribute set to interleave and the name attribute set to the value shown inside the rectangle (in this example attlist.person);
- define pattern with the combine attribute set to choice and the name attribute set to the value shown inside the rectangle (in this example attlist.person);
- value pattern, used for example inside a choice pattern;
